Flickr mention (`/photos` prefix)
.
@username@flickr.com
.
<p><a href="https://flickr.com/photos/username" rel="external">@username</a></p>
.


Instagram mention (no prefix)
.
@username@instagram.com
.
<p><a href="https://instagram.com/username" rel="external">@username</a></p>
.


Micro.blog (no prefix)
.
@username@micro.blog
.
<p><a href="https://micro.blog/username" rel="external">@username</a></p>
.


Twitter mention (no prefix)
.
@username@twitter.com
.
<p><a href="https://twitter.com/username" rel="external">@username</a></p>
.


Vimeo mention (no prefix)
.
@username@vimeo.com
.
<p><a href="https://vimeo.com/username" rel="external">@username</a></p>
.


YouTube mention (no prefix)
.
@username@youtube.com
.
<p><a href="https://youtube.com/username" rel="external">@username</a></p>
.
